alert.note: Alert for Indian River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 4:29PM EDT until October 03 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Indian River and St. Lucie. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sebastian, Vero Beach, Fellsmere, Indian River Shores, Winter Beach, Gifford, Wabasso, Vero Beach South, Sebastian Highlands, Pointe West, Vero Lake Estates, Vero Beach Highland, South Beach, Orchid, Vero Beach Airport, Grovenor Estates, Wabasso Beach, Disneys Vero Beach Resort, Jaycee Beach and Florida Ridge. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
